title: "Artificial Intelligence grading your ‘neuroticism’? Welcome to colleges' new frontier"
excerpt: "Artificial intelligence, or AI, is being used to shoot off these seemingly personal appeals and deliver pre-written information through chatbots and text personas meant to mimic human banter. It can help a university or college by boosting early deposit rates while cutting down on expensive and time-consuming calls for stretched admissions staffs."
